name: hex-battle-game
description: A GameFi dApp that allows players to compete with capture the most cells on an hex battlefield.

scripts.gh-pages: gh-pages -d dist -r $(git remote get-url gh-pages) -b main -m "deploy ref:$(git describe --tags --always --dirty)"
scripts.build-asset: pwa-asset-generator src/asset/logo.svg public --favicon --type png --padding 0 --background transparent --opaque false --log false
scripts.build-app-v1: mkdir -p dist && cd src/app-v1 && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/
scripts.build-app-v2: mkdir -p dist/v2 && cd src/app-v2 && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/v2/
scripts.build-app-v4: mkdir -p dist/v4 && cd src/app-v4 && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/v4/
scripts.build-app-v5: mkdir -p dist/v5 && cd src/app-v5 && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/v5/

author: hex-battle-game
